did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.unittitle: Andral, Gabriel. Cours de Pathologie Interne

address.addressline: Hanna Holborn Gray Special Collections Research Center

did.abstract: Manuscript, prepared lectures in French, on internal pathology. Includes index. I) "Appareils de la vie de relation: 1e de l'Innervation, 2e de la Locomotion"; II) "Appareil de l'Innervation: centres nerveux - nerfs - sensations."

prefercite.head: Citation
prefercite.p: When quoting material from this collection, the preferred citation is: Andral, Gabriel, Cours de Pathologie Interne, Crerar Ms 72, Hanna Holborn Gray Special Collections Research Center, University of Chicago Library

scopecontent.head: Scope Note
scopecontent.p: Holograph, prepared lectures in French, on internal pathology. Includes index. I) "Appareils de la vie de relation: 1e de l'Innervation, 2e de la Locomotion"; II) "Appareil de l'Innervation: centres nerveux - nerfs - sensations." Inscribed on flyleaf: "Presented to the John Crerar Library by Bayard Holmes, as a token of many courtesies." Bound in brown buckram over marbled paper.
